parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Interaction

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Structured Text

</value></part><part><name>gr3</name>=<value> Strings

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Same as [[hint]], but without a sound.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[hintSilent]] text

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> text: [[String]] or [[Structured Text]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[hintSilent]] [[format]] ["Hello, %1!", [[name]] [[player]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] "Hello there!";
[[sleep]] 5;
[[hintSilent]] ""; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>removes message</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[hint]], [[hintC]], [[hintCadet]]
</value></part></template>
